title: Patterns in Politics and Storytelling | with Gregg Hurwitz
description:
I discuss storytelling and politics with best selling author Gregg Hurwitz.  Gregg has written Batman and the best selling novel series Orphan X.  He has also participated in producing a new advertisement to change the narrative of the American Democratic Party.

Gregg's website:  http://gregghurwitz.net/

My links:  
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
